results.name: Crazy Nick's Software Picks: King Graham's Board Game Challenge

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600K or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-11700F or AMD Ryzen 7 5800X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

requirements_ru.recommended: Pentium III 450, 128 Мб, OpenGL, Direct3D 6, Glide
